solution_line_template: If Antonella spent ${spent_amount} and now has ${remaining_amount}, that means initially she had ${spent_amount} + ${remaining_amount} = $<<{spent_amount}+{remaining_amount}={initial_total_money}>>{initial_total_money}
Knowing the value of L, we can solve for T= {total_coins_initial} - {num_loonies} = {total_coins_initial} - {num_loonies} = <<{total_coins_initial}-{num_loonies}={num_toonies}>>{num_toonies}
